Text:
Place apps in /Applications
GMM.framework in /Library/Frameworks

If you've copied MobileMail, plance the included preferences bundle in /System/Library/PreferenceBundles
heh..very fast post, but wheres the seed? thanks.
It's seeding...  I see 7 seeds right now.  Don't know why it isn't showing up here though.

ah yea thanks, I just got it. Mail seems to work now :)
I'll seed as well.
yes, this fixes the crashing bug with the 1.1.1 version.  I've tried mail, maps, notes & Weather and all work perfectly.

I've downloaded the file now. Im using Windows and have a ipod toch 1.1.2 unhacket ( cant find out how to jailbreak ).

But what do i do now? Where do i put these files?
Any help would be nice!
check touchdev.net's jailbreak guide for detailed info on how to do this

I have jailbreaked my ipod. But i still dont know how i can get those apps to my ipod. Its not in my apps list on the installer i get from the jailbreak.

What can i do?
Can you type the command i need to write in iphuc please?

Hey,

On windows, when you hack 1.1.2, make sure you install SSH with it...

Then, use WinSCP to SSH into the ipod (on Wi-Fi), and copy the files as needed.  Easy as pie.
